product_name: The North Face Cypress Half-Zip Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Spend a day at the crag or your campsite wearing this comfortable, yet fully functional women's Cypress Half-Zip hoodie from The North Face. Lightweight, four-way stretch knit fabric features underarm gussets that allow you to extend your arm with ease. Thumbholes provide extra coverage by preventing cuffs from riding up. Drawcord hood with contrast print binding is fitted for a low-profile silhouette. The North Face Cypress Half-Zip hoodie features zip hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Spend a day at the crag or your campsite wearing this comfortable, yet fully functional women's Cypress Half-Zip hoodie from The North Face.
